short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch random images from prnt.sc with a click using 'Random prnt.sc - Lightshot' Explore snapshots effortlessly and enjoy surprises!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover random images from prnt.sc effortlessly with the 'Random prnt.sc - Lightshot' extension. With a single click, this extension fetches and displays a random image from the prnt.sc website, making it easy to explore a variety of snapshots. Perfect for those who enjoy spontaneity and visual surprises.
